Field Detail

from

public long from

to

public long to

order

public long order
The priority of this interval. If there are two equivalent intervals the order value declares which interval is "bigger" than the other. The smaller the order the higher is the priority.

borderDist

public long borderDist(long x)
Parameters:
x -
Returns:
The distance of a given point to the interval borders min(|x-A|,|x-B|).

distance

public long distance(long x)
Parameters:
x -
Returns:
The distance of a given point to an interval which is 0 if x is in [A,B] or the smaller distance from the ends of the interval: min(|x-A|,|x-B|).
